entry.def: If someone moves or looks upwards, they move or look up towards a higher place.

example.ex: They climbed upward along the steep cliffs surrounding the village...
example.tran: 他们沿着村庄周围的陡峭悬崖往上爬。

entry.def: If an amount or rate moves upwards, it increases.

example.ex: ...with prices soon heading upwards in high street stores...
example.tran: 商业大街上商店里的价格迅速上涨

example.ex: Unemployment will continue upward for much of this year...
example.tran: 今年的大部分时间失业率仍将上升。

entry.def: A quantity that is upwards of a particular number is more than that number.

example.ex: It costs upward of $40,000 a year to keep some prisoners in prison.
example.tran: 关押某些犯人一年的成本超过4万美元。

means.word_mean: 1. spatially or metaphorically from a lower to a higher position;
